mainText:
Steve, you're the most creative, exciting man in the planet. You've inspired
me to really go out there and persevere through every obstacle, you
really defined the meaning of possible. Anything is possible if you put your
mind to it, you will be missed. Watching you during those keynotes,
announcing the most innovative products ever, laughing when you said "And
one more thing"...your loss really saddens me.

My sincere thoughts and prayers are with you.
author: Joel
